amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 121 from the bill which requires the Bureau of Ocean Energy Management, Regulation and Enforcement to keep detailed records and provide quarterly reports on any oil and gas permit or plan that was not approved by the agency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 121 of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dicks amendment (A029) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Dicks amendment (A029) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Dicks.
